edu.ncsu.csc216.flix_2.customer

Class MovieCustomerAccountSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.flix_2.customer.MovieCustomerAccountSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerAccountManager

    public class MovieCustomerAccountSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerAccountManager
    This class controlls the flow of the system and delegates tasks to their appropriate places. Keeps track of the state of the currently logged in customer or admin and holds the movie inventory system along with a running list of customers.
    Author:
    Eric Matysek, Nick Brust

      • addNewCustomer

        public void addNewCustomer(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           int maxAtHome)
        Add a new customer to the customer database. The administrator must be logged in.
        Specified by:
        addNewCustomer in interface CustomerAccountManager
        Parameters:
        id - id/email for new customer
        password - new customer's password
        maxAtHome - number associated with this customer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the database is full or the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if customer with given id is already in the database

      • cancelAccount

        public void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
        Cancel a customer account.
        Specified by:
        cancelAccount in interface CustomerAccountManager
        Parameters:
        id - id/username of the customer to cancel
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no matching account is found
